about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a passionate freelance web developer with over 5 years of experience creating beautiful, functional websites for clients worldwide.
My approach combines technical expertise with creative design thinking to deliver websites that not only look great but also drive real business results.
Whether you're a startup looking for your first website or an established business wanting to upgrade your online presence, I'm here to help you succeed.
about.quote: Success is not about the tools you use, but how you use them to solve real problems for real people.

aboutPage.title: About Me
aboutPage.subtitle: A passionate developer helping businesses succeed online

story.title: My Story
paragraphs: I've been building websites for over 5 years, working with clients ranging from solo entrepreneurs to growing businesses. My journey started with a simple curiosity about how websites work, and grew into a passion for creating digital experiences that make a real difference.

What drives me isn't just writing code—it's seeing the impact a well-crafted website has on someone's business. There's nothing quite like launching a project and watching it help a client reach new customers, streamline their work, or finally have that professional online presence they've been dreaming of.

I believe in doing things right, even when no one's watching. That means clean code, thoughtful design decisions, and always putting the user experience first. Every project is an opportunity to create something meaningful.

values.title: Quality Over Speed
values.description: I'd rather take a bit more time to do something right than rush and create problems later. Your website should be built to last.

values.title: Clear Communication
values.description: No jargon, no surprises. I explain things in plain language and keep you updated throughout the process.

values.title: Partner Mindset
values.description: I'm not just a contractor—I'm invested in your success. Your goals become my goals.

values.title: Continuous Learning
values.description: Web technology evolves fast. I stay current so you get modern, future-proof solutions.

aboutPage.quote: The best websites aren't just pretty—they solve real problems for real people.

cta.title: Let's Build Something Together
cta.description: Whether you have a clear vision or just a rough idea, I'd love to hear about your project.

process.title: How I Work
process.description: From first conversation to launch, here's what to expect when we work together

phases.title: Discovery
phases.description: We start with a conversation about your goals, audience, and vision. I'll ask questions to understand what success looks like for your project and identify any technical requirements.
phases.clientExperience: A casual 30-minute call where you share your ideas and I listen. No pressure, just getting to know your project.

phases.title: Design
phases.description: Based on our discovery call, I create mockups and wireframes showing the look and feel of your site. We iterate until you're excited about the direction.
phases.clientExperience: You'll receive visual mockups to review. Share feedback, and I'll refine until it feels right.

phases.title: Development
phases.description: I build your site using modern, performant technologies. You'll get regular progress updates and a preview link to see the site come together.
phases.clientExperience: Watch your site take shape with weekly updates. Test it yourself and let me know what to adjust.

phases.title: Launch
phases.description: Final testing, optimization, and deployment. I handle all the technical details and make sure everything works perfectly before going live.
phases.clientExperience: A smooth handoff with training on how to update your site. Ongoing support available if needed.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Let's discuss your project and see how I can help.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about working with me

items.question: How much does a website cost?
items.answer: Every project is unique, so I provide custom quotes based on your specific needs. A simple landing page starts around $1,500, while a full e-commerce site with custom features can range from $5,000-$15,000+. Contact me for a free quote tailored to your project.

items.question: How long does a project take?
items.answer: Timeline depends on complexity. A landing page typically takes 1-2 weeks, a portfolio site 2-3 weeks, and a full e-commerce site 4-8 weeks. I'll provide a specific timeline during our initial consultation.

items.question: What's your payment structure?
items.answer: I typically require 50% upfront to begin work, with the remaining 50% due upon project completion. For larger projects, we can arrange milestone-based payments.

items.question: Do you offer revisions?
items.answer: Yes! Each project includes 2-3 rounds of revisions depending on scope. I want you to be 100% satisfied with the final result. Additional revisions beyond the included rounds are billed hourly.

items.question: What if I need changes after launch?
items.answer: I offer ongoing maintenance packages for clients who need regular updates. For one-off changes, I'm happy to provide hourly support. Most clients don't need much after launch since I build sites to be easy to update.

items.question: What technologies do you use?
items.answer: I specialize in modern web technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for the frontend. For e-commerce, I work with Shopify, WooCommerce, or custom solutions depending on your needs.

items.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly?
items.answer: Absolutely! Every site I build is fully responsive and tested across all devices. Mobile-first design is standard in all my projects.

items.question: Do you handle hosting?
items.answer: I can recommend and set up hosting for you. Most of my sites are deployed on Vercel or Netlify for optimal performance. I'll guide you through the process and can include hosting setup in the project.

items.question: Can you add custom features like booking or payments?
items.answer: Yes! I regularly integrate booking systems, payment processing (Stripe, PayPal), user authentication, and other custom functionality. Let me know what you need during our consultation.

items.question: Will I be able to update the site myself?
items.answer: Depending on your needs, I can build with a content management system (CMS) that lets you easily update text, images, and content. I'll also provide training on how to make updates.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: I'm happy to answer any other questions you might have. Let's chat!
